document.full_text: yemen's opposition rejected on thursday an offer to join gulf-mediated talks on a transfer of power in the arabian peninsula state, and set a two-week deadline for president ali abdullah saleh to step down.
document.title: yemen opposition spurns talks, sets saleh deadline
lines_and_colors: yemen's opposition rejected on thursday an offer to join gulf-mediated talks on a transfer of power in the arabian peninsula state, and set a two-week deadline for president ali abdullah saleh to step down.
